reviews.review: It ain't no 1.6 but it'll do, i guess..

I've been playing Counter-strike since 1.5 and i can safely say that this edition is the worst version of them all. Yes even worse than Condition Zero. 

1. The graphics are horrible for 2013 game, it's like there wasn't put any effort into it.
2. For such a lightweight game, i get a shitload of FPS drops. The game doesn't feel smooth at all
3. Absolute shit weapon mechanism. It's like the game randomly decides if my bullet will hit. Spraying sucks, steady short burst fires suck. Absolutely no hits at all even though the enemy is standing still and i'm shooting steadily 1 bullet /0.5 seconds. 

Can't be arsed to play this game anymore, even though i loved all the versions before. especially 1.5 and CS:S.
Russians, ak-47's, screaming kids, this is like home.
pretty awesome though sometimes toxic players

Counter strike is a game that takes skill and team co-ordination, without the two you'll never get out of silver. I would know ;(

Edit: Honestly this game is still great but with the product going free to play it has gotten worse with cheaters. For some reason players who even own prime still don't understand that this game is a team game and would rather do their own thing resulting in you losing. This game is full of idiots and I have no idea how these people thought it would be a good idea to put a monetary investment into the game when they can't even play with a team or don't have a microphone. Why are you gonna play a team game and not have a microphone?
classic game. very fun to play. however,community is trash. will meet hackers and smurfs in every other game while ranking up
